modalHint: Long press or click the right mouse button to save the avatar to your album
siteDescription: A Notion hand-drawn style avatar maker tool that supports customizing facial features, hairstyles, glasses, beards, and accessories to generate unique personal avatars with one click. Perfect for Notion, GitHub, Twitter, and other social platforms, ideal for team collaboration and personal branding. Try it now and easily create your own Notion-style avatar!
downloadTip: Currently supports svg and png formats, try changing the format at the download button
shareModalHint: Share to your favorite social media!
shareContent: I just created an avatar with Notion Avatar Maker, check it out!
siteKeywords: Notion Avatar,Avatar Maker,Notion Style,Hand-drawn Avatar,Custom Avatar,Minimalist Avatar,Team Avatar,Personal Brand,Social Media Avatar,SVG Avatar,PNG Avatar,Free Avatar Creator,Online Avatar Generator,GitHub Avatar,Twitter Avatar
whosUsingDescription: Teams and individuals around the world are using Notion Avatar
useCasesDescription: Explore the versatile applications of Notion-style avatars
